Counter Strike is Counter Strike, what more is there to review besides all the game modes and game balance.
VALVE PLEASE FIX HOSTAGE WEAPON BALANCE. AK-47 on defence with one tap capability is too overpowered. Give the terrorist side something like an AK-74 or something that imitates the counter terrorist M4s in defusal mode and vice versa for the counter terrorists. I suggest giving counter terrorists something like the Honey Badger with 300. blackout ammo with one tap capability for the hostage mode offensive balance.
